tags.name: editable-list
tags.description:
`editable-list`
`a listing of items that can be edited in place with operations`

Events:

  * `edit-mode-changed` {`CustomEvent<{ value: any; }>`} - 

  * `simple-modal-show` {`CustomEvent<{ title: string; elements: { content: HTMLDivElement; buttons: HTMLDivElement; }; styles: { "--simple-modal-width": string; "--simple-modal-max-width": string; "--simple-modal-z-index": string; "--simple-modal-height": string; "--simple-modal-max-height": string; }; invokedBy: any; clone: boolean; }>`} - 

  * `simple-modal-hide` {`CustomEvent<{}>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `activeElement` - Active element being worked on in the list

  * `edit-mode` {`boolean`} - ability to edit the items in the list

  * `items` {`any[]`} - items array

Properties:

  * `activeElement` - Active element being worked on in the list

  * `editMode` {`boolean`} - ability to edit the items in the list

  * `items` {`any[]`} - items array

attributes.name: activeElement
attributes.description:
`activeElement` - Active element being worked on in the list

Property: activeElement

attributes.name: edit-mode
attributes.description:
`edit-mode` {`boolean`} - ability to edit the items in the list

Property: editMode

Default: false

attributes.name: onsimple-modal-show
attributes.description: `simple-modal-show` {`CustomEvent<{ title: string; elements: { content: HTMLDivElement; buttons: HTMLDivElement; }; styles: { "--simple-modal-width": string; "--simple-modal-max-width": string; "--simple-modal-z-index": string; "--simple-modal-height": string; "--simple-modal-max-height": string; }; invokedBy: any; clone: boolean; }>`} -

tags.name: editable-list-item
tags.description:
`editable-list-item`
`an individual list item`

Events:

  * `edit-mode-changed` {`CustomEvent<{ value: any; }>`} - 

  * `editable-list-item-delete` {`CustomEvent<{ element: this; }>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `value` {`string`} - The value that gets bound into the text field

  * `edit-mode` {`boolean`} - ability to edit the items in the list

  * `editing` {`boolean`} - Editing state of the item

  * `can-edit` {`boolean`} - Permission to edit this

  * `can-delete` {`boolean`} - Permission to delete this

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Properties:

  * `value` {`string`} - The value that gets bound into the text field

  * `editMode` {`boolean`} - ability to edit the items in the list

  * `editing` {`boolean`} - Editing state of the item

  * `canEdit` {`boolean`} - Permission to edit this

  * `canDelete` {`boolean`} - Permission to delete this

  * `accentColor` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `colors` -

attributes.description:
